T02D2045:144a-1: tsakra raksha aa dhishth'a na prishth'a ya au ba de sha n'a ma /
T02D2045:144a-3: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i byin brlab dang phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba //
T02D2045:144a-4: bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2045:144a-5: srid gsum ro mnyam bde chen po //
T02D2045:144a-6: dpal ldan gshin rje 'joms mdzad la //
T02D2045:144a-7: btud de de yi phrin las ni //
T02D2045:144a-9: bsnyen pa byas ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2045:144a-11: sgrub na de yi byin gyis rlob //
T02D2045:144a-12: blang bya de nas yang ni sgrub //
T02D2045:144a-13: dben par mandala sogs byas la //
T02D2045:144a-14: rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor mchog / mchod dang gtor ma bum ba bzlas //
T02D2045:144a-15: spyin sreg de bzhin chos 'byung la //
T02D2045:144a-16: phyogs skyong bkod la phyi rol du //
T02D2045:144a-17: rnal 'byor gtor ma byin la bsgo //
T02D2045:144a-18: de nas dang bcas slob ma ni //
T02D2045:144a-19: khrus byas thal mo sbyar byas la ;
T02D2045:144a-20: / bla ma la ni phyogs par gzhag / skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la sogs dang //
T02D2045:144a-21: sangs rgyas lnga yi sdom pa spyin //
T02D2045:144a-22: ji skad gsungs pa'i las rab 'byams //
T02D2045:144a-23: bsgrub pa'i bsam pa nyer gzhag ste /
T02D2045:144a-24: bam las byung ba'i padma'i steng //
T02D2045:144a-25: h'um byung dus dgra dmar po bsam /
T02D2045:144a-26: snying dang mgrin par ya bsgom pa //
T02D2045:144a-27: lte bar re'u mig dgu pa'o //
T02D2045:144a-32: rengs shing bsad pa rnams 'dod pa ltar 'grub pa gyis shig sv'a h'a //
T02D2045:144a-34: hr'i shtvi: wi kri t'a na na /
T02D2045:144b-0: g-yas skor gyis phyogs bzhir @144b ro ;
T02D2045:144b-3: bcu gnyis rtsibs ni ser po la //
T02D2045:144b-4: kshe dza ya yig dbus dang g-yas //
T02D2045:144b-5: g-yon du dgod par bya ba nyid //
T02D2045:144b-6: lho ru ma yatstsha yig go //
T02D2045:144b-7: nub tu yi ge me don //
T02D2045:144b-8: byang gi gsum la do ru na //
T02D2045:144b-9: rtsibs mtshams bkod pa'i yi ge ni //
T02D2045:144b-10: na yo ni ra lan gsum mo //
T02D2045:144b-11: de nas re'u mig phyi ma la //
T02D2045:144b-12: aom ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
T02D2045:144b-13: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
T02D2045:144b-14: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D2045:144b-15: yakshe yatstsha ni ra ma ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2045:144b-16: 'khor lo kha sbyar rab dmigs la //
T02D2045:144b-17: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2045:144b-18: rgyal ba'i phrin las thams cad dang //
T02D2045:144b-19: mthu dang yon tan tshogs bsdus la //
T02D2045:144b-20: snying dang mgrin pa'i 'khor lor gzhug / slob dpon dmar po'i 'khor lo'ang //
T02D2045:144b-21: ji ltar me ni me gcig la //
T02D2045:144b-22: mar me gcig chad ji bzhin du //
T02D2045:144b-24: slob ma'i snying dang mgrin par glan //
T02D2045:144b-25: gsang sngags rgyal po bcu bzhi dang ;
T02D2045:144b-26: / rtsa ba'i sngags ni sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02D2045:144b-27: yi ge bcu gnyis lung byin la //
T02D2045:144b-28: bris shing bsgrub pa byas pa yi //
T02D2045:144b-29: 'khor lo'i rdzas ni lag byin la //
T02D2045:144b-30: brtan phyir rdo rje spyi bor gzhag / tishtha badzra tsakra raksha sa ma ya mu dra ho //
T02D2045:144b-31: brtan dang g-yo ba'i bcud kun las //
T02D2045:144b-32: mi bskyod zhi dang dbang byed pa //
T02D2045:144b-33: mngon spyod dam pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D2045:144b-34: rab 'byams las rnams bsgrub phyir zung //
T02D2045:144b-35: 'di ni ding nas bzung byas te //
T02D2045:144b-36: mi 'bral bar ni bya ba'o / de ni rjes su gnang ba yi //
T02D2045:144b-37: las ni thogs med myur ba dang //
T02D2045:144b-38: lha mnyes pa dang rim gnyis kyi //
T02D2045:144b-40: gzhan du 'khor lo rtsom pa ni //
T02D2045:144b-42: sngar byas dngos grub dang 'dod pa //
T02D2045:144b-43: bye phung chu la sogs bzhin no //
T02D2045:144b-44: 'khrul 'khor gyi byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa mkhas
T02D2045:144b-45: shing grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
T02D2045:144b-46: dpal 'dzin chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
T02D2045:144b-48: * // de nas yang dag bshad pa ni //
T02D2045:144b-49: gsad dang rengs dang bskrad la sogs //
T02D2045:144b-50: bya 'am gzhan gyis byas kyang rung //
T02D2045:144b-51: phyir bzlog rim pa 'ang gsal bar bya //
T02D2045:144b-53: rmi sogs dan pa byung gyur tshe //
T02D2045:145a-1: pa drug tu bya ba ste //
T02D2045:145a-2: rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2045:145a-3: rlung dang mnyam med dag dang ni //
T02D2045:145a-4: srung pa med pa'i bsrung ba'o //
T02D2045:145a-5: de la re zhig rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2045:145a-6: seng ldeng dbyug pa gla rtsi dang //
T02D2045:145a-7: gi wam shu dag gu gul dang /
T02D2045:145a-8: gandhi til dang yungs kar dang //
T02D2045:145a-9: mu men byi ru si la dang /
T02D2045:145a-10: tsandan dmar sogs de bzhin du //
T02D2045:145a-11: li khri mtshal dkar 'dus byas la //
T02D2045:145a-12: srung ba me las bcu gsum ltar //
T02D2045:145a-13: bskyed la bcu gsum gnas su gzhag / h'um kshe ma med dza sa do ru yatstsha ni ra /
T02D2045:145a-14: snying ga mig dang rna ba sna //
T02D2045:145a-15: kha dang lte ba 'og sgo gnyis //
T02D2045:145a-16: brla gnyis phrag pa gnyis dang ni //
T02D2045:145a-17: de bzhin spyi bo'i gtsug la reg / ji ltar zhe sdang gshed sogs bsgom //
T02D2045:145a-18: rdzas rnams brdungs te lus la bcad //
T02D2045:145a-19: tshangs dang khyab 'jug drang srong sogs //
T02D2045:145a-20: log par byed pa'i rig sngags kyis //
T02D2045:145a-21: nam yan tshugs bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2045:145a-22: phyi yo byad rdzas kyis phyir bzlog pa'o //
T02D2045:145a-23: shin tu ngan par byed pa yi //
T02D2045:145a-24: rig 'dzin la sogs med gyur na //
T02D2045:145a-25: de bzlog pa yi cho ga ni //
T02D2045:145a-26: tshad med sems sogs sngon 'gro bas //
T02D2045:145a-27: gsang sngags gsum gyis dag par bya //
T02D2045:145a-28: aom sh'a n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2045:145a-29: nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam bya ba ;
T02D2045:145a-30: / bam ram las byung bad nyi'i snying //
T02D2045:145a-31: sna tshogs rdo rje yongs gyur pa'i //
T02D2045:145a-32: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste //
T02D2045:145a-33: rtsibs bcu mu khyud lte bar bcas //
T02D2045:145a-34: bhr'um las byung ba'i gnas bcu la /
T02D2045:145a-35: h'um byung rgyu dang bsre ba las //
T02D2045:145a-36: ji ltar 'byung ba'i khro bo bskyed //
T02D2045:145a-37: dbus su rang nyid gshin rje gshed//
T02D2045:145a-38: mdog gnag khros pa ma he'i steng //
T02D2045:145a-39: de ltar bskyed nas cho ga bzhin //
T02D2045:145a-40: rdo rje gsum du bya ba dang //
T02D2045:145a-41: gzhug dang bcing sogs legs byas nas //
T02D2045:145a-42: takki r'a dza grangs med pas //
T02D2045:145a-43: gnod byed gdung zhing dgug la gzhug / rdo rje'i go gon snying ga yi //
T02D2045:145a-44: sems dpa'i gnas su bsrung bya ni //
T02D2045:145a-45: dmigs las bzlas te 'khor bas so //
T02D2045:145a-46: dus dus gtor ma spyin par bya //
T02D2045:145a-47: gzir ba'i spyin sreg mtshan phyed na //
T02D2045:145a-48: khro bo bcu la spyin par bya //
T02D2045:145a-49: phyi'i byang sngags kyis phyir bzlog pa'o //
T02D2045:145a-50: gal te rnal 'byor lam pa la //
T02D2045:145a-51: rtog dang mtshan mas g-yengs pa'i byad //
T02D2045:145b-0: @145b de bzlog pa yi rnal 'byor ni //
T02D2045:145b-1: rlung gi sbyor ba brtsam bya ste //
T02D2045:145b-2: au ba tanta dha ra na //
T02D2045:145b-3: ti ma bya gra mus la //
T02D2045:145b-4: g-yo dang 'jug pa'i rlung bzung ste //
T02D2045:145b-5: dbu mar rgyu ba ye shes rlung //
T02D2045:145b-7: nyon mongs las kyi rlung shugs dag / ye shes chen por byed pa ste//
T02D2045:145b-8: su yi mthus kyang mi tshugs so //
T02D2045:145b-9: nang byang rlung gis byir bzlog pa'o //
T02D2045:145b-10: gdon dang 'jigs dang byad dang nad //
T02D2045:145b-11: bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams kun //
T02D2045:145b-12: phyi rol gyur pa la yin pas //
T02D2045:145b-13: phan tshun bsri ba'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2045:145b-14: ji ltar dug la bdud rtsi bzhin //
T02D2045:145b-15: bar gcod ye shes chen por bya //
T02D2045:145b-16: 'dzin sogs rtog pa'i bdud byung na //
T02D2045:145b-17: 'dzin mkhan rtog pa rang nyid kyang //
T02D2045:145b-18: pha rol gdon du bsgyur byas la //
T02D2045:145b-19: gdon nyid gang yin gdon par bya //
T02D2045:145b-20: de ltar rang nyid gnod byed ni //
T02D2045:145b-21: lhar blta pha rol de bzhin no //
T02D2045:145b-22: de nas bla ma dran byas nas //
T02D2045:145b-23: ji snyed brtan g-yo lha dang sngags //
T02D2045:145b-24: su yis su la gnod byed pa //
T02D2045:145b-25: 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma rang sar grol //
T02D2045:145b-26: 'dzin pa kun bshig spros med kyi //
T02D2045:145b-28: nang gi byad ting nge 'dzin gyis phyir bzlog pa'o //
T02D2045:145b-29: mthar thug ye shes bdud gyur pa //
T02D2045:145b-31: blang bya mya ngan 'das pa ste //
T02D2045:145b-32: gnyis su rgyu ba nyid yin no //
T02D2045:145b-33: de nyid lam du bya ba yang //
T02D2045:145b-34: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gsung bzhin bshad //
T02D2045:145b-35: dmyal sogs 'khor ba'ang legs shes na /
T02D2045:145b-36: sangs rgyas nyid las ma g-yos te //
T02D2045:145b-37: phung po lnga ru gnas phyir ro //
T02D2045:145b-38: ye shes lnga ni yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2045:145b-39: lus kyi dri chen la sogs lnga //
T02D2045:145b-40: bde gshegs lnga nyid bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D2045:145b-41: rig ma lngar ni gzhug phyir ro //
T02D2045:145b-42: rgyas sras brgyad du gnas phyir ro //
T02D2045:145b-43: lha mo drug tu gnas phyir ro //
T02D2045:145b-44: 'jigs byed bcu ni yin phyir ro //
T02D2045:145b-45: de ltar thams cad sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D2045:145b-47: nad 'joms sman la dug bzhin du //
T02D2045:145b-49: gal te 'khor ba nyid yin yang //
T02D2045:145b-50: 'khor ba thog ma dbus mtha' med //
T02D2045:145b-51: skye dang 'gag pa kun kyang spangs //
T02D2045:145b-52: skad cig rdul gyi cha spangs la //
T02D2045:146a-2: sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin du //
T02D2045:146a-3: skye la skye ba yod min pas //
T02D2045:146a-4: sgyu ma'i skyes bus sgyu ma yi //
T02D2045:146a-5: bud med 'dor ba dag dang mtshungs //
T02D2045:146a-6: de ltar bsgoms pas 'khor ba la //
T02D2045:146a-8: gal te rang nyid bde ba yi //
T02D2045:146a-9: zag med dbyings la sems dga' na //
T02D2045:146a-10: gnyis med snying rje lhan cig skyes //
T02D2045:146a-11: zung du 'jug pa bsgom par bya //
T02D2045:146a-12: don gnyis 'byor ba'i sangs rgyas ni //
T02D2045:146a-13: bdag don kho na ma yin te //
T02D2045:146a-15: rgyal srid rang bde'i phyir bzung na //
T02D2045:146a-16: gzhan phung 'jug tu bdag kyang phung //
T02D2045:146a-17: bdag ni til tsam med pa'i phyir //
T02D2045:146a-18: bdag gi don gyis ci zhig bya //
T02D2045:146a-19: bdag med ye shes lhan skyes kyis //
T02D2045:146a-20: bdag sred ma lus rab bcad nas //
T02D2045:146a-21: gzhan don kho ni'i blo yis ni //
T02D2045:146a-22: mi gnas lhan cig skyes dga'i mchog / brjod min cir yang snang ba nyid //
T02D2045:146a-23: rang bzhin spros dang bral ba ni //
T02D2045:146a-24: shel la tshon gyi kha dog ltar //
T02D2045:146a-25: sna tshogs stong pa'i gzugs nyid ni //
T02D2045:146a-26: bde stong gsal zhing mi rtog pa //
T02D2045:146a-27: brtan g-yo sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02D2045:146a-28: yongs su khyab pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D2045:146a-29: spros med byang chub sems su gnas //
T02D2045:146a-30: gang du btsal yang mi rnyed de //
T02D2045:146a-31: bcom ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po //
T02D2045:146a-32: lhan cig skyes dga' zung 'jug na //
T02D2045:146a-33: gdod nas gnas pa yin phyir ro //
T02D2045:146a-35: blang dor ma mkha'i sprin bzhin du //
T02D2045:146a-36: rang bzhin gyis ni zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D2045:146a-37: mthar thug ye shes kyi byad rnal 'byor gnyis kyis phyir bzlog pa'o /
T02D2045:146a-39: // / de ltar bla ma'i drin las thob par gang gyur pa //
T02D2045:146a-40: gshin rje gshed dpal gsang ba'i man ngag gsang ba 'di //
T02D2045:146a-41: dri med ji bzhin gsal bar byas la nongs pa kun //
T02D2045:146a-42: chos dbyings yin phyir ye shes che rnams bzod mdzad rigs //
T02D2045:146a-43: gnyug mar gnas pa bde chen snying rjes brlan gyur pa //
T02D2045:146a-44: bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad dpal ldan dus dgra dmar po nyid //
T02D2045:146a-45: 'di byas dge ba'i mthu yis srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus pas //
T02D2045:146a-46: chu la chu ltar rang gi ye shes chen po
T02D2045:146a-47: ro gcig rtogs gyur cig / phyir bzlog man ngag
T02D2045:146b-0: gsang ba @146b las kyang ches gsang pa /
T02D2045:146b-1: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po'i zhal gyi
T02D2045:146b-2: gdams pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dngos
T02D2045:146b-3: grub mchog brnyes pa'i dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2045:146b-5: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa nu pa mar kshi ta dang /
T02D2045:146b-6: lo ts'a ba dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa /
T02D2045:146b-7: dus phyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar gnyis su
T02D2045:146b-8: rgyar gar shar phyogs kyi mkhas pa chen po drpan
T02D2045:146b-9: a'a ts'ar+ya dang / lo ts'a ba glo bo shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus so //
T02D2045:146b-10: 'di'i dpe skabs su rgya gar bal po thams cad
T02D2045:146b-11: du rgyun chad pa las phyis au rgyan du mkha'
T02D2045:146b-12: 'gro ma rgya mtsho'i gos can las rnal 'byor senta
